meanings.definition: A technique used in molecular biology to detect specific proteins in a sample.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used an immunoblot to find the protein in the sample.
meanings.sent2: The immunoblot revealed the presence of the specific protein in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The immunoblot decided to show up at the protein party.
meanings.sent4: The immunoblot was like a detective uncovering clues in the protein mystery.
meanings.sent5: The immunoblot lit up the protein like a spotlight on a stage.

meanings.definition: The result of performing an immunoblot analysis on a sample.
meanings.sent1: After the experiment, the scientist eagerly awaited the immunoblot.
meanings.sent2: The immunoblot image displayed the outcome of the protein analysis.
meanings.sent3: The immunoblot result was so clear, it could have won an award.
meanings.sent4: The immunoblot outcome was a shining beacon of success in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The immunoblot result was as bright as a star in the night sky.

meanings.definition: To perform an immunoblot on a protein sample.
meanings.sent1: The researcher will immunoblot the protein sample tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She decided to immunoblot the sample to identify the protein.
meanings.sent3: The scientist immunoblotted the protein sample with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: Immunoblotting the sample was like shining a light on the mystery protein.
meanings.sent5: He carefully immunoblotted the sample, revealing the hidden protein.
